title: Sinatra: An American Icon – Multimedia Exhibition
preview: March 2015 through September 4th, The New York Public Library for the Performing Arts unveiled a free multimedia exhibit exploring the life and career of legendary singer, performer, recording artist, and actor, Frank Sinatra. This exhibition was curated by the GRAMMY Museum of Los Angeles in collaboration with The Library for the Performing Arts and the Sinatra Family and is the official exhibition of the 2015 Frank Sinatra Centennial.
seo_title: Sinatra: An American Icon – Multimedia Exhibition | WestHouse Hotel New York
